experience.title: Data Science Consultant (Student Project)
description: Worked closely with HealthAid International to design and implement a data-driven solution aimed at enhancing donor engagement and retention.
Conducted an in-depth analysis of historical donation data to uncover trends, patterns, and key factors influencing donor behavior.
Developed and deployed machine learning models, including clustering algorithms, to segment donors into actionable groups based on their giving patterns and preferences.
Proposed targeted outreach strategies tailored to each donor segment, leveraging insights from data analysis to improve personalization and engagement.
Created interactive dashboards and visualizations to communicate findings and recommendations effectively to stakeholders.
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to ensure the solution aligned with the nonprofit's mission and operational goals.

experience.title: Finance Intern
description: Assisted with budgeting, forecasting, and reporting within the finance team.
Worked with Excel, Power BI, and SAP to analyze and visualize financial data.
Developed dashboards and automated reports to support decision-making processes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather and validate financial data for analysis.
Identified cost-saving opportunities by analyzing expense trends and providing actionable insights.
Supported the preparation of monthly and quarterly financial statements for internal and external stakeholders.
Participated in financial audits and ensured compliance with corporate policies and regulations.

experience.title: Co-founder
description: Revolutionized the lemonade industry by establishing a cutting-edge lemonade stand on the corner of Main Street.
Pioneered innovative lemon-squeezing techniques to maximize juice extraction and customer satisfaction.
Crafted a secret lemonade recipe that allegedly 'changed lives' (according to one very enthusiastic customer).
Developed a robust marketing strategy involving hand-drawn signs and strategic placement of free samples.
Analyzed sales data to determine the optimal balance of sugar and lemons, achieving a 200% increase in repeat customers.
Negotiated high-stakes deals with local fruit vendors to secure the freshest lemons at competitive prices.
Managed a dynamic team of one (myself) while maintaining a perfect work-life balance under the shade of a beach umbrella.
